I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
my dad worked for home depot.

i love to watch the voice.

participant_2.background:
I'm happy that I'm able to help out in my family, and that I got to meet a real unicorn!
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
I wear comfortable clothing so I can feel my best while taking walks.
I'm proud of my new Mercedes Benz.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.

content.text: Not so bad. My teeth are hurting because I wasn't chewing my food right, but other than that, I'm good. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm looking forward to the weekend. I'm going to a reptile zoo with my friends.
That sounds really fun! I love reptiles. I have a pet lizard at home.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of lizard?
It's a green anole. They're pretty easy to take care of.
I've never heard of a green anole. Is it a kind of gecko?
Yes, it is. They're small lizards that are native to the southeastern United States.
That's so cool! I've never seen a gecko before.
You should come over and see mine sometime.
I would love to! Thanks for the offer.
No problem. It's always nice to meet new people who are interested in reptiles.
Me too. I love learning about new animals.
Well, I'm glad I could help you learn something new.
You're welcome. Thanks again for the offer to show me your gecko.
No problem. I'm always happy to share my reptiles with people.
